thread.section_title: Goldtop Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of goldtop.co.uk
thread.title: CaronNick

author: CaronNick
title: CaronNick
text: have been enjoying my Triumph Thruxton now for last 12 months I wanted some new gloves that looked a little 'nostalgic' and stumbled on the Goldtop gauntlets. So took a gamble that they'd be as good as they looked? They really are. These are the warmest, most comfortable, coolest looking (in a vintage sort of way) gloves Ive ever bought, and half the price of my Rukka's and after rubbing in their water repellent balm,they are pretty water proof too. They are getting better as they break in.Absolutly love them.Very highly recommended if you want something a bit special....
